resources.string: An unknown error has occurred. The app should be updated to fix this issue. Please email me for support.

Ohh no! I knew this day would come eventually. It looks like Pandora has changed their API, meaning that the Andora app must be updated. Depending on the severity of the change this may take a while. Please check online for informational updates.
An internal error has occurred. Pandora may have temporarily blocked your account. Please try again later.
Pandora is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
Pandora is not officially available in your country. Don\'t fret, you may be able to use a proxy to bypass this error :)
Pandora believes you have insufficient connectivity. This may mean that messages are arriving later than expected. Please make sure your clock is set correctly and try again.
Pandora is currently in read only mode. Please try again later.
Your user authentication token is no longer valid. This error should not occur. Please email me for support.
Pandora has changed their authentication credentials. The Andora app must be updated. Please check online for informational updates.
You are not authorized to listen. It is possible your Pandora One subscription has expired.
You are not authorized to perform this action. This error should not occur. Please email me for support.
Station limit reached. You may not create any more stations :(
This station no longer exists. Please choose a new one.
You are already using your complimentary trial.
This request is not allowed. This error should not occur. Please email me for support.
Device not found.
Partner not authorized.
This email address is invalid
Your password must be at least 5 characters
This email is already in use
This device is already associated to your account.
Upgrade model is invalid. Even I am not sure what this means. Ohh well, I\'m sure it\'s something I will eventually need to fix
This pin is incorrect
This pin is malformed
This device model is invalid. It is possible Pandora has changed their authentication credentials and that the app must be updated. Please email me for support.
This zip code is invalid
This year is invalid
You are too young
Invalid country code or gender. This error should not occur. Please email me for support.
There is no Pandora account associated with this email
This device is disabled
You have reached your daily trial limit. Please come back tomorrow.
Invalid sponsor. Please use a valid sponsor code.
Sorry but you have already used your trial.
